summary: we don’t know if we’ll learn tj’s real name. maybe tj doesn’t have a real name. anything can happen, the writers have thrown...
body: we don’t know if we’ll learn tj’s real name. maybe tj doesn’t have a real name. anything can happen, the writers have thrown twists at us before. maybe he’ll reveal his full name on the beach or in a booth. who can really say what’s gonna happen. for all we know we could learn walker’s real name, or wyatt’s. anything can happen. sometimes people break up with their names and their forevername will we the first name they initially wanted. the name that was originally planned for. who know’s what’s gonna happen. we can’t say for sure tj has a full name. he’s never shown any signs of having a full name. sometimes i feel like tj’s real name is all anyone ever talks about. but we don’t know if he has one. we can’t say for sure. anything can happen. i think it’s a bit of a reach when say that real names and tj is not sure the full name real he we not sger hrt naasdsszz%jhsnn

blog.name: lemonwilford
blog.description: he wanted me to be the villain. maybe he should be more careful with his wishes.

body:
Curious

masterpost

Chapter 4

summary: Andi has been watching Jamber fall apart (from a distance) since she stopped helping them, Cyrus helps distract her so she’ll stop torturing herself. (tw: depression)

Andi feels bad for putting her phone on do not disturb but she knows she’ll keep helping Jonah and Amber stay in their toxic relationship if she doesn’t have it on. She keeps scrolling through their social media’s though, which isn’t helping considering they’ve both been posting asking where Andi is for the past few days.

Andi decides she can’t sit and look through their posts asking where she is again and calls Cyrus for help.

“Hey,” she notes that Cyrus sounds extra happy and to ask about that later.

“Can we hang out? I can’t be alone anymore, it’s killing me.”

“Yeah,” she notices his hesitation, “I’m with Tj, is that okay? If not, I can come by when we’re done hanging out.”

“No it’s okay, just please don’t tell him what’s going on. I don’t want to feel any worse than I already do.”

Cyrus chuckles and glances at Tj, “Okay. Do you want to meet up with us or us to go to your house?”

“Will you please come to my house, I don’t want to leave and chance running into either of them.”

“Okay. We’ll be there soon, And.”

Andi chuckles, “Stop calling me ‘And’!” she protests.

“It got you to laugh,” she can hear the smug shrug in his voice and rolls her eyes before hanging up.

Bowie answers the door when Tj and Cyrus get to Andi’s house, “Uh, sorry guys Andi isn’t here.”

“She asked us to come over,” Cyrus informs him. The two of them are allowed in the house and Cyrus leads them to Andi’s room. “Hey, And.”

Andi sighs as they come into her room, “Hey Cy, Tj.”

Tj nods in response.

Cyrus puts a bag on Andi’s floor, “On the way over we stopped for some supplies,” he starts pulling things out of the bag, “We got paints and brushes. That’s all I could find,” he shrugs.

Andi offers a weak smile, “Thanks, Cy, but I don’t feel like painting.”

“Okay, scary concept.” He sits on Andi’s bed, motioning for Tj to do the same.

“How about uno?” Tj holds up a deck of cards off Andi’s shelf.

She looks over to him, “I forgot I had that, sure.”

The three of them play uno for a few hours with varying rules from the online version until Andi notices Tj’s phone starting to be blown up.

“Uh, Tj, someone’s trying really hard to reach you,” she nods to his phone which sits on her bed.

He looks at his phone with remorse, “I gotta go. I’ll see you later, Cy,” he kisses to top of his head, “I hope you figure out whatever’s going on, And.”

Andi’s too shocked to correct him on her name before he leaves. “Cyrus?”

“Hmm?” he hums sheepishly.

“He just kissed your head?” Andi states as a question.

“Surprise?” he offers with jazz hands, “Were dating.”

“Is that why you sounded so happy when you answered the phone?” He nods. “I’m happy for you,” she smiles at him, “And proud of you, you got yourself a mans.” She giggles and pokes at him while he gathers the uno cards.

“Thanks,” he says quietly.

The two of them stay in silence until Cyrus sets the cards back on top of Andi’s shelf. “Will I ever get what you have?”

“What? A boyfriend?”

“Happiness.”

Cyrus sits beside his friend. “Of course you will.”

“When?” Andi asks.

Cyrus furrows his eyebrows, “Where is this coming from?”

“I don’t know,” Andi sighs, “I just- I don’t know if I’ll ever be as happy as everyone around me is. My parents are happy, Bex has Cloud Ten and Bowie has the Red Rooster plus they’re happy together. You’re happy with Tj and everything else seems to be going well for you. Buffy’s soaring with basketball and she’ll never admit it but she’s got Marty who makes her happier than anything.”

“Don’t compare yourself or your life to other people. You never know what’s actually going on, for one, but most importantly, their story is their story. Focus on your own.”

“Just- when will I find my person who makes everything better?”

Cyrus looks between Andi’s fidgeting hands and her partially hidden-by-hair face, “Is that Amber for yoy right now?”

“Yeah, but she can’t be my person.”

“You don’t know that. Regardless, you should allow yourself to be around your happiness.”

“I want to, but it hurts seeing her with Jonah or to hear her constantly talking about him, I want her to talk about me,” Andi pouts.

Curious

blog.description:
sadie. 23. she/they. lesbian. here to talk about tv & give advice. hoodie enthusiast. fandom mother.

main blog & twitter: sadieannerue instagram: dailymackcast, andimackpapercraneproject

summary: I don't understand what's up with Jonah and his danishes??? could explain it please
question: I don't understand what's up with Jonah and his danishes??? could explain it please
answer: It was a joke he made, unintentionally. Jonah declares that muffins don’t have eyes, but danishes do. He was referring to the pastry, and likely referencing the fact that they have a center that resembles an eye. Buffy laughed and was impressed because she thought he was being clever. She thought he was referencing Danish people, who obviously have eyes. From her perspective, it was a double entendre which made it funny and clever, but from his perspective it was a one-layered reference, so he didn’t understand why she thought it was so clever. Or at least that’s how I always interpreted the joke.

reblog.comment: It was a joke he made, unintentionally. Jonah declares that muffins don’t have eyes, but danishes do. He was referring to the pastry, and likely referencing the fact that they have a center that resembles an eye. Buffy laughed and was impressed because she thought he was being clever. She thought he was referencing Danish people, who obviously have eyes. From her perspective, it was a double entendre which made it funny and clever, but from his perspective it was a one-layered reference, so he didn’t understand why she thought it was so clever. Or at least that’s how I always interpreted the joke.

She thought he was referencing Danish people, who obviously have eyes. From her perspective, it was a double entendre which made it funny and clever, but from his perspective it was a one-layered reference, so he didn’t understand why she thought it was so clever. Or at least that’s how I always interpreted the joke.

blog.name: ficworms
blog.title: When Canon Isn’t Enough
blog.description: I can’t write but I can certainly read

summary: Best Laid Plans - Chapter 1 - captainkippen - Andi Mack (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Best Laid Plans - Chapter 1 - captainkippen - Andi Mack (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
“I guess I realised how much I like him, y’know?” Said Cyrus.
TJ quirked an eyebrow at him but didn’t call his bluff. Instead, he just flicked another couple of M&Ms across the table. “I get that,” he said, smiling slightly. “Sometimes crushes come out of nowhere.”

Asking TJ for help in getting his crush’s attention seemed like a great idea at the time, but Cyrus never anticipated that he’d fall for him in the process.

blog.name: andi-mack-diversity
blog.title: Andi Mack Diversity Appreciation Week
blog.description: Andi Mack has provided us with such an amazing set of diverse and interesting characters. I just wanted to make a week where we could, well, appreciatate it.

summary: Alright everyone, AMDAW starts tomorrow! Contribute whatever ever you’d like. Fanfic, fanart, headcanons, edits, gifs, a bullet...
body:
Alright everyone, AMDAW starts tomorrow! Contribute whatever ever you’d like. Fanfic, fanart, headcanons, edits, gifs, a bullet list, anything! Tag it as Andi Mack Diversity Appreciation week or AMDAW, or just send it through ask or submit.

Day 1 - Race/Heritage

Day 2 - LGBTQ+

Day 3 - Gender

Day 4 - Disability

Day 5 - Religion

Day 6 - Family

Day 7 - Free day

blog.name: jyrusmagocious
blog.title: Forever Shipping Jyrus
blog.description: 23 Male

summary: I got an ask and  just wanted to make a post about it Some people may think i hate everyone who doesnt ship Jyrus but thats not...
body:
I got an ask and just wanted to make a post about it Some people may think i hate everyone who doesnt ship Jyrus but thats not the case i am in 2 discords with people who dont ship jyrus i follow a ton of non jyrus people

The thing i hate is when people act like there is no reason to ship Jyrus at all and i shouldnt do it

And i hate when i look at a Jyrus shippers blog and see they get anons like “Wow you ship jyrus? But my ship is canon and will be endgame (even tho its not canon)

I also hate people who ship two characters that have never met like Iris and reed (who werent even in the same season) but cant imagine shipping Jyrus

summary: i mean cyrus would literally just be gordo if he was straight.
question: i mean cyrus would literally just be gordo if he was straight.
answer:
I mean you’re not WRONG but I still think that Cyrus’ character was more complex and less stereotypical, even when not looking at the sexuality storyline. 

But Jewish? Film geek? Practical advice giver? Psychiatrist parents? Two female best friends? Yeah.

reblog.comment:
